function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Open windows may lead to the uneven distribution of pollutants in a building, with some areas experiencing rapid reduction in pollutant concentration while others take longer to clear.","Impact":"Uneven distribution of pollutants can lead to health risks for occupants in areas where pollutants linger for longer periods.","Mitigation":"Use of a more effective method for evacuating pollutants from the entire house, such as opening multiple windows across different levels of the home.","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, air purifiers, and smart window technology for automated control of window opening.","People":"Occupants of the building, especially those in areas where pollutants linger for longer periods.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and occupants themselves can implement mitigation measures."}]}
